sentences.en: A remarkably safe riding toy for all ages, the Swing Car has received global acclamation.
sentences.cn: 该摇摆车是非凡的安全骑乘玩具,适合各年龄段, 在全世界广受欢迎.

sentences.en: All her remarks were greeted with acclamation.
sentences.cn: 她所有的话都得到喝彩.

sentences.en: At first it looked like I was going to win by acclamation.
sentences.cn: 起初看起来我会以口头表决的方式获胜。

sentences.en: For every one who came to power singing by acclamation.
sentences.cn: 为每一位上台唱歌的人鼓掌.

sentences.en: Honor comes in a continuous stream and acclamation keeps lasting.
sentences.cn: 荣誉纷至沓来,喝彩经久不息.

sentences.en: The decision was taken by acclamation .
sentences.cn: 该决议是经口头表决而作出的。

sentences.en: The decision was taken by acclamation.
sentences.cn: 该决议是经口头表决而作出的.

sentences.en: The motion was carried by acclamation.
sentences.cn: 动议经口头表决而通过.

sentences.en: The news was greeted with considerable popular acclamation.
sentences.cn: 消息赢得了相当普遍的欢呼。

sentences.en: The slate was approved by acclamation during the closing general session of the meeting.
sentences.cn: 是的石板以鼓掌方式批准在闭幕会议的一般性会议.

sentences.en: They took an oath to the LORD with loud acclamation and with trumpets and horns.
sentences.cn: 他们就大声欢呼、吹号吹角、向耶和华起誓.

sentences.en: This is the applause acclamation that I want.
sentences.cn: 这个为我才是真正的称赞,这也是我所想要的赞扬.

sentences.en: We applaud her for this year in this extraordinary girl acclamation!
sentences.cn: 我们赞扬她为今年在这个非同寻常的姑娘鼓掌!

sentences.en: When Christ shall come, with shout of acclamation.
sentences.cn: 基督再临, 欢呼喝彩盈天空.

words.tran_cn: 欢呼，喝彩；鼓掌欢呼表示通过

phrases.tran_cn: (加)（选举）作为惟一候选人当选

trans.tran_en: a loud expression of approval or welcome
